DOC.brief_summary: This prospective randomized is designed to evaluate the safety and efficacy of hernia repairs using local anesthesia compared with those using general anesthesia for patients with incarcerated hernia.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Local Anesthesia in Emergency Inguinal Hernia Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: The outcome parameters measured included intraoperative conditions, postoperative conditions and long-term follow-up conditions.
